mapper.insert: INSERT INTO space_tb (space_name, description, capacity, price, biz_start_time, biz_end_time, space_location, space_phone_Number, sector, is_inside, created_at, user_id, sport_id) VALUES (#{spaceName}, #{description}, #{capacity}, #{price}, #{bizStartTime}, #{bizEndTime}, #{spaceLocation}, #{spacePhoneNumber}, #{sector}, #{isInside}, NOW(), #{userId}, #{sportId});
mapper.select: select * from space_tb as space join space_pic_tb as pic on space.id= pic.space_id where space.id = #{id}
select * from space_tb space left join sport_tb sport on space.sport_id = sport.id left join space_pic_tb pic on space.id = pic.space_id order by space.id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
